definition: short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: Among eight items, B-10 with special effect draws much attention for its fancy look.
sentences.chinese: 其中的特殊效果镲外观独特，吸引注意。

sentences.english: Very pleasing crash sound for hats.
sentences.chinese: 作为踩镲，声音非常令人满意。

sentences.english: He worked hard; otherwise he would have failed.
sentences.chinese: 他努力读书镲，否则他当时一定会不及格。

sentences.english: In this case we recommend the use of Paiste Cymbal Protector.
sentences.chinese: 此种情况我们推荐使用派斯特镲片保养剂。

sentences.english: Pleasure should be subordinate to duty.
sentences.chinese: 应以职务镲为主，娱乐为次。

definition: sanxian, large family of 3-stringed plucked musical instruments, with snakeskin covered wooden soundbox and long neck, used in folk music, opera and Chinese orchestra
suona, Chinese shawm (oboe), used in festivals and processions or for military purposes/also written 鎖吶|锁呐/also called 喇叭[la3 ba5]
a bowed stringed instrument with a thin wooden soundboard
